timeline.body: There is no `ifPresent` and `orElse` code here. - Can't we use `int` and `-1`? - This would be closer to the data model of `linkedFiles`.
timeline.bodyText: There is no ifPresent and orElse code here. - Can't we use int and -1? - This would be closer to the data model of linkedFiles.

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change

int oldFileIndex = -1;
int i = 0;
while (i < linkedFiles.size() && oldFileIndex == -1) {
